ValidationRule.description: Users should use a valid picklist value
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CASE( Type__c , "Manual", 1, "Ftest", 1, "Silktest", 1, "Utest", 1, ".Net", 1, "CTI - script", 1, "Client Automation", 1, "Selenium", 1, "Systest", 1, "ProdTest - Selenium", 1, "ProdTest - API", 1, "ProdTest - Extended", 1, 0) = 0
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incorrect Type Value. Must be picked from the list
